page.title: 09ACTIVITIES IN RIPPINGALE
page.content: {Rippingale Village Hall}is a very important part of community life, being used for most of the village activities.The Over 60s,Women's Institute,Nursery School,Parish Council,Drama Group,Discos,Yoga Class and Bingo players all have regular sessions.The hall is also rented out for auctions,jumble sales,wine and cheese parties,Church bazaars and the Village Hall Market besides birthday, wedding and anniversary parties.During the year there is at least one classical musical evening and three professional troupes of players give performances of plays or pantomimes. This year,a football team has come into being and they use the changing rooms and showers.The village also boasts Bowls and Tennis Clubs.For the Village Feast the hall is used continuously through the weekend.
